item.title: Test Post 1
item.description: Test Post Just a test dat <- MASS::mvrnorm(100, c(x = 0, y = 0), matrix(c(1, .8, .8, 1), 2, 2)) cor.test(dat[, "x"], dat[, "y"]) ## ## Pearson's product-moment correlation ## ## data: dat[, "x"] and dat[, "y"] ## t = 13.781, df = 98, p-value < 2.2e-16 ## alternative hypothesis: true correlation is not equal to 0 ## 95 percent confidence interval: ## 0.7326169 0.8698252 ## sample estimates: ## cor ## 0.
